attributes.action: make, all polititions swear on oath to answer the questions put to them by the public or media.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When interviewed by our media, or attending public meetings. How many times do politicians avoid giving a direct answer too a question.  I believe that all party MP’s; councillors and other representatives swear an oath.  The context of this oath should be the same as the one given in our courts except the word EVIDENCE is replaced by ANSWERS.  Furthermore if asked too give a Yes or No answer then that shall be the response given.  No more spin, just more accountability for the truth.
